english: when push comes to shove (coll)
german: wenn es hart auf hart kommt (ugs)

english: when it comes to ...
when it comes to ...
when it comes to ...

english: when it comes to how
when worse comes to worse
when it comes down to it (idiom)
when it comes to doing sth.

english: When it comes to his looks ...
when it comes to the point
if / when it comes to the crunch

english: When / If it comes to the point that ...
german: Wenn es so weit ist, dass ...

english: when the current season comes to an end
to be totally ignorant when it comes to sth.
german: völlig unbeleckt sein in Bezug auf etw. (ugs)

english: to push and shove
to give sb. the push / shove (idiom, Br, dismiss)
to push / shove the ball over the bar (sports)
german: den Ball über die Latte lenken

english: when the crunch comes
german: wenn es hart auf hart kommt (ugs)

english: I hope that when the world comes to an end, I can breathe a sigh of relief, because there will be so much to look forward to. (quote, Donnie, Darko)
german: Ich hoffe, dass ich, wenn die Welt untergeht, erleichtert aufatmen kann, weil es dann so viel gibt, auf das ich mich freuen kann.

english: When Saturday Comes (film, F, Maria, Giese)
When poverty comes in, love flies out. (proverb)
I love it when a plan comes together. (film, quote, The, ATeam)
german: Ich liebe es, wenn ein Plan funktioniert. (Das, ATeam)

english: to shove to one side
sth. comes to
That comes to ...
A comes down to B
if worst comes to worst
Ill luck comes to me.
It comes easy to him.
The work comes to me.
Everything comes to him who waits. (proverb)
german: Mit Geduld und Zeit kommt man weit.

english: if it comes to the worst (adv)
if it comes to the worst
german: wenn der Fall der Fälle eintritt (ugs, wenn, der, schlimmste, Fall, eintritt)

english: It always comes down to money.
That comes to a total of ...
Everything comes to light in the end. (proverb)
german: Es ist nichts so fein gesponnen, 's kommt doch alles an die Sonnen.

english: if (the) worst comes to (the) worst
if (the) worst comes to (the) worst (idiom, adv)
if (the) worst comes to (the) worst
if (the) worst comes to (the) worst (idiom)
if (the) worst comes to (the) worst
if (the) worst comes to (the) worst
german: wenn es hart auf hart kommt

english: if the worst comes to the worst
if the worst comes to the worst
if the worst comes to the worst
See that some harm comes to him.
german: Sieh zu, dass ihm irgendetwas passiert.

english: That's what it comes down to.
What it comes down to is, ... (coll)
It comes to sth. (eg, to, a, fight)
german: Es kommt zu etw.Dat. (z, B, zum, Kampf)
